name: This Mole DOES NOT Share His Food!!1
name_original: This Mole DOES NOT Share His Food!!1
description:
You are a mole. Protect the garden you feed on from other vermin for as long as you can!

Created by jjovanovski and vidak for Global Game Jam Macedonia 2023. 

Music:

"Pump", "Breakdown"
